title: Gross
review: All 4 stars just for Black Widow. And her tight suit. Storyline is 6-year-old fans of marvel.

title: What the hell did I just watch?
review: Is it captured for 12-year-old girls or what? Silly love-story, just couldn't watch it for more than 20 minutes.

title: Fincher at his best
review: The movie is great, the book is not. Don't like the message but the movie is filmed awesome.

title: That's bad
review: Another not-funny-at-all romantic comedy in apocalyptic setting. What a shame.

title: Meh
review: I thought that it would never end. Another boring and not funny marvel movie.

title: Awful
review: Speaking racoon... speaking tree... sony walkman in the deep space... What have you been smoking?

title: Nicely done
review: Operator's work is just perfect, the idea is even better. Kinda surrealistic movie but still worth watching.

title: Saw it about 50 times
review: My favorite movie at last, still not tired of rewatching this again and again.

title: Ooo, strong women strike again
review: But Jenifer Lawrence still plays well, in her opinion.
